title: The land rate and the rate of construction for calculation of the basic ratio shall be taken for the year in which the URS is approved by the competent authority and shall remain unchanged during the entire project cycle of the URS
clause_text: The land rate and the rate of construction for calculation of the basic ratio shall be taken for the year in which the URS is approved by the competent authority and shall remain unchanged during the entire project cycle of the URS.
